column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3:
とはいえ彼に対する態度に関しては
あの姫と気が合いそうだよ僕
column4:
And if you ask me, the whole thing does
seem to be overkill.I think I'm on the same page as the princess
regarding...this boy.

column3:
しょうがないよ
御ひい様にとっちゃ あいつの存在は……
column4: Oh, give it a rest.That boy is a living reminder of her own failures.

column3: そう コンプレックスの象徴みたいなもんだから
column4: Well, at least that's how the princess sees him.

column3: 何言ってんの
column4: Wasn't this your idea?

column3: ……退魔の剣に選ばれし ハイラルの勇者よ
column4:
Hero of Hyrule, chosen by the sword 
that seals the darkness...

column3: その たゆまぬ努力と結実せし剣技を認め……
column4:
You have shown unflinching bravery and
skill in the face of darkness and adversity.

column3: 女神ハイリアの名において祝福を授けん……
column4:
And have proven yourself worthy of
the blessings of the Goddess Hylia.

column3: 空を舞い時を廻り黄昏に染まろうとも……
column4:
Whether skyward bound, adrift in time, or steeped
in the glowing embers of twilight...

column3: 結ばれし剣は勇者の魂と共に……
column4:
The sacred blade is forever
bound to the soul of the Hero.

column3: さらなる力が そなたと そして退魔の剣に宿らんことを……
column4:
We pray for your protection...and we hope that—that the two of you will grow stronger
together, as one.

column3: ……遥か遠き過去に生まれし退魔の剣よ
column4:
Forged in the long-distant past, the sword
that seals the darkness...

column3: 勇者と共に ハイラルの守護を担うものよ
column4:
Guardian of Hyrule, ancient steel, forever
bound to the hero.

column3: 女神ハイリアの名において祝福を授けん……
column4:
In the name of Goddess Hylia, I bless you
and your chosen hero.

column3: 海を越え神の創りし黄金を求めん時……
column4:
Over the seas of time and distance, when we need
the golden power of the Goddess...

column3: そなたの姿常に勇者と共に在り……
column4:
Our hope rests in you, to be forever by the
hero's side.

column3: 退魔の剣と ハイラルの勇者に さらなる力宿らんことを……
column4:
Again we pray...that the two of you will grow
stronger...and be together as one.

column3: やれやれ
column4: Gee, this is uplifting...

column3: 前途多難みてえだな
column4: She's making it sound like we already lost.

column3:
「御付の騎士任命の記念に太古の伝説真似てみろ」
って はやし立てたの あんただろ？
column4:
You're the one who wanted to designate the
appointed knight with all the ceremonial pomp,
grandeur, and nonsense we could muster!
